project_plan.name: Simple Contact Book in Python
project_plan.description: Implement a simple contact book application that allows users to add, search, update, and delete contacts. The contacts will be stored in a JSON file, and the application will interact with the user through the terminal.

task.name: Implement the feature to add contacts to the JSON file
Implement the feature to search for contacts in the JSON file
Implement the feature to update existing contacts in the JSON file
Implement the feature to delete contacts from the JSON file
Write tests for each of the features above
Execute tests on all implemented features to ensure that they function correctly
